resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

This App is a downsized version of many mini apps.The purpose of this application is to stay healthy by tracking the amount of calories consumed. "

"Calorie Tracking is a method used by people who want to reach their fitness goals sooner."

"Exercise is an essential means to get to the dream physique which we have always craved for but exercise alone isnt enough because as blunt as it may sound,abs are made in the kitchen."

"Take the first step into turning yourself into a fitter version with this app.

* BMI Calculator"
""
"* Pedometer"
""
"* 7 minute workout routine"
""
"* Breathe Aid "

" *Food calorie Counter

* The BMI calculator lets you calculate bmi and also mentions the ideal calorie intake"

" * Pedometer counts the number of steps taken in order to track calories burnt while walking or jogging"

" * The workout routine consists of a few basic exercises to help shed a few more pounds and burn calories"

" * The breathe app is an aid to practise efficient breathing technique"

" * The food calorie counter is the main aspect of this app and lets you know the calories consumed after inputting food items.
